Sidecarless Service Mesh Based on Progra.message: 基于可编程内核的无 Sidecar 服务网格
Sidecarless Service Mesh Based on Progra.description: Sidecarless Service Mesh Based on Programmable Kernel

Kmesh is a high-performance service grid.message: Kmesh 是一款基于 ebpf 和可编程内核实现的高性能服务网格数据平面软件。它采用无 Sidecar 架构，无需在数据平面上部署代理组件。它实现了服务治理功能，并提高了服务访问的转发性能。
Kmesh is a high-performance service grid.description: Kmesh is a high-performance service grid data plane software implemented based on the ebpf and programmable kernel. It adopts the sidecarless architecture and does not need to deploy proxy components on the data plane. It implements the service governance function and improves the forwarding performance of service access.

At present, the latency and noise floor.message: 目前，服务网格数据平面的延迟和噪声基底开销已成为服务网格技术发展的关键问题，且数据平面技术多样。我们致力于为客户提供更轻量、更高效的服务治理能力，以满足客户对安全性、敏捷性和效率的要求。
At present, the latency and noise floor.description: At present, the latency and noise floor overhead of the data plane of the service grid has become a key problem in the development of the service grid technology, and the data plane technologies are diverse. We are committed to providing customers with a lighter and more efficient service governance capability to meet customers' requirements for security, agility, and efficiency.

Automatic Integration with Istio and oth.message: 与 Istio 和其他软件自动集成
Automatic Integration with Istio and oth.description: Automatic Integration with Istio and other software

Service startup performance 40%↑.message: 服务启动性能 提升 40%

ServiceMesh data plane overhead 70%↓.message: ServiceMesh 数据平面开销 降低 70%

Integration with Mainstream Observabilit.message: 与主流可观测性平台集成*

Support for XDS Protocol Standards.message: 支持 XDS 协议标准

High-performance service mesh dataplane.message: 高性能服务网格数据平面

The forwarding delay of the service mesh.message: 服务网格的转发延迟降低 5 倍
The forwarding delay of the service mesh.description: The forwarding delay of the service mesh is reduced by 5x

click here for more Details.message: 点击此处了解更多详情
